Testimonials.name: Vuyiseka Njovane
Testimonials.description: Unathi has a remarkable ability to quickly grasp complex concepts and apply them in practical scenarios.

Testimonials.name: Thimna Alam
Testimonials.description: Unathi is the most goal driven person I have ever met. She is always willing to learn - curious in other words.

Testimonials.name: Joel Mukanya
Testimonials.description: She excels in collaborating with others and has gained proficiency in HTML5, CSS, and Bootstrap. Including Git and GitHub.

Testimonials.name: Inganathi Stemela
Testimonials.description: Unathi is an outstanding individual ,who is always calm and hard working. She is well customed when it comes to working with others and always does her best in her work and for that I admire her.

Testimonials.name: Siyanda Cetywa
Testimonials.description: Unathi She has demonstrated impeccable energy for the assignments of this coding course in the few time that I have known her. Unathi shows initiative in completing tasks quickly and effectively. One of her strongest suit is her ability to articulate things to the team. The ideal colleague for a group setting.
